data.eml:eml: Genus Camptocercus (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Chydoridae) in North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sinev, Artem Y. (2018): Genus Camptocercus (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Chydoridae) in North America. Zootaxa 4459 (3): 583-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4459.3.11
